welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leiderdorp, a charming city known for its picturesque canals and historic windmills. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and experience its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schiphol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schiphol Airport, primarily serving European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Schiphol Airport, dedicated to long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
